channel.title: Abouts on Copeka Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Copeka Coffee

item.title: Markdown Block Formats
item.description: Layout & typography ::: margin left book ::: Grand Junction – Text set in all caps gets converted to small-caps by default. This means that acronyms like BBC don’t stand out relative to the rest of the text. Acronyms even $ x^2 $ work with $ x f(x) = 2x^2 + 2/3 $ accents like ÀÊØ. A possessive acronym like CNN’s opinion works as well. What about the FCC!

item.title: Menus
item.description: fresh pastries made daily $(various prices) ask your barista for today’s selection (mostly :v:) (:gf: options) house made granola with local honey $$ milk — 5.25 $$ yogurt — 6.5 $$ hello — 2.3 $$ yogurt and fresh seasonal fruit — 8.5 $$ milk and yogurt options are :d: or :v: aardvark toasts all of our toasts are served on our house made aardvark bread, a seedy rustic loaf of legend.
